name: Promotion Class: Warden
description:
Role: Melee-Ranged Defense

A well-rounded defender of the forest, good with both bows and one-handed weapons. Access to mail armor makes them sturdier than their leather-wearing counterparts.

Stat Adjustments:
Damage Reduction +6%

Traits Granted:
Recurve Bow Mastery
Axe Mastery
Mace Mastery
Short Sword Mastery
Mail Armor Proficiency
Quiver Proficiency
Energy Regeneration in all Trays

Enhancements:
Twin Surge: Now second attack applies a Suppress.
Concussive Trap: Now has a reduced cooldown.
Disengage: Now also places a trap where you leapt from.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Warden promotion class and prevents access to the Archer and Brigand promotion classes.
